title: Client won't start
body: I press the shortcut, the logo appears, nothing opens.

replies.body:
To jump on some of the comments in this thread, if you are using Avast make sure to add League of Legends to its whitelist to allow for it.  If you're unsure how to do this, we have an[ in-depth guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3) to help you out.

If you aren't using Avast at all, then this may indicate a corruption with the patcher itself.  Essentially, it is trying to launch itself, but something is preventing it from doing so.  To get this fixed up, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Patching Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues).  

Feel free to reply back and let me know if you are still experiencing issues!

I've had this issue before with Avast so naturally I looked into it next after rebooting my PC, but it didn't fix it at first for some reason so I thought it was something else (which lead to me making this thread.)
Eventually I managed to make it work. I don't know what I did differently, but I allowed League the second time and the patcher would launch.
Thanks for taking your time to check this out, though! :3 <3

Hi, I also wanted to chime in here. I am having the same issue as the OP. I click to launch League, I see the logo briefly, it may flicker once or twice and then it disappears, no client launched.

I did notice an avast popup, alerting me to a suspicious program (lolupdater, oh the irony, even avast sees patches as cancer). So, I set up an exclusion for LoL and even disabled Avast, attempted to relaunch and nothing. I restarted my computer at this point and tried again (avast still disabled) and still nothing.

I am at a loss here, so any help would be greatly appreciated. Next step for me will probably be a fresh install of LoL or something.

After i excluded it, it launched like the breeze.  Make sure u did all your steps as you described them.  Retrace all your steps.  If the exact same thing is still happening, disable avast, make sure LoL is excluded.
